Name: CurrentLayerChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a new layer will start to be used.

Parameters.Name: OldLayer
Parameters.Documentation: Previous layer that was being used.

Parameters.Name: NewLayer
Parameters.Documentation: New layer that will be used.

Name: GroupAddedToLayerEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a group is added to a layer's collection.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Layers.ILayer" /> the group was added to.

Name: GroupRemovedFromLayerEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a group is removed from the layer's collection.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Layers.ILayer" /> the group was removed from.

Name: LayerAddedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a layer is added to the diagram.

Name: LayerRedrawEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a redraw is requested for a layer.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Layers.ILayer" /> that requested the redraw.

Name: LayerRemovedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a layer is removed from the diagram.

Name: LayerVisibilityChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the visibility of a layer changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Layers.ILayer" /> whose visibility state changed.

Name: LayerZIndexChanged
Summary: Event triggered when the ZIndex of a Layer changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Layers.ILayer" /> whose ZIndex was changed.

Name: NodeAddedToLayerEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node is added to a layer's collection.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Layers.ILayer" /> the node was added to.

Name: NodeRemovedFromLayerEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node is removed from a layer's collection.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Layers.ILayer" /> the node was removed from.
